definitions.definition: give special importance or prominence to (something) in speaking or writing.
examples: he jabbed a finger into the tabletop to emphasize his point
synonyms: make a point of; Morebring to the fore
rub it in "the profile emphasizes his dedication to feeding the hungry"

definitions.definition: lay stress on (a word or phrase) when speaking.
examples: stress, underline, highlight, focus attention on, point up, lay stress on, draw attention to, spotlight, foreground, play up, make a point of; Morebring to the fore, insist on, belabor; accent, accentuate, underscore; informalpress home, rub it in "the profile emphasizes his dedication to feeding the hungry"Morebring to the fore, insist on, belabor; accent, accentuate, underscore; press home, rub it in the profile emphasizes his dedication to feeding the hungry
a one-piece bathing suit that emphasized her build
